scripts.migrate: tsc --target ES2022 --module NodeNext --moduleResolution NodeNext --outDir .tmp/migrate scripts/migrate-to-ndjson.ts && node .tmp/migrate/migrate-to-ndjson.js
scripts.chunk:index: tsc --target ES2022 --module NodeNext --moduleResolution NodeNext --outDir .tmp/migrate scripts/chunk-ndjson.ts && node .tmp/migrate/chunk-ndjson.js --vehicleKey default
scripts.build: npm run build:data && tsc && vite build
